com.samsung.android.service.health.tracking.data

Enum HealthTrackerType

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<HealthTrackerType>
      • com.samsung.android.service.health.tracking.data.HealthTrackerType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<HealthTrackerType>

    public enum HealthTrackerType
extends Enum<HealthTrackerType>
    HealthTrackerType defines different kinds of health data to track.
    Health trackers provides batching and on-demand types.

    Using On-Demand Health Trackers

    Follow these guidelines when using the on-demand tracker type:

    • Use on-demand trackers in a foreground application, not in the background.
      Do not use more than one on-demand tracker at the same time.
    • An on-demand tracker type is not intended for continuous measurement.
      Track on-demand type sensors for no longer than 30 seconds.
    • During the on-demand tracker type data measurement, tracking a continuous tracker type can give invalid values.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    HealthTrackerCapability.getSupportHealthTrackerTypes()

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ACCELEROMETER
      Deprecated. 
      This type is deprecated. Use ACCELEROMETER_CONTINUOUS instead.

      An enum value for tracking accelerometer data.
      Accelerometer data is retrieved with a batching event every 12 seconds.

      ACCELEROMETER_CONTINUOUS
      An enum value for tracking accelerometer data.
      BIA
      Deprecated. 
      This type is deprecated. Use BIA_ON_DEMAND instead.

      An enum value for tracking body composition (BIA) data.
      It provides 1 data point for each measurement.

      BIA Measurement Guide

      • Make sure your Galaxy Watch is on tightly.
      • Raise your arm so your armpits are open.
      • Place your middle finger on the 2 o'clock key and your ring finger on the 4 o'clock key on Galaxy Watch.
      • Touch your Galaxy Watch only.
        Don't let the hand on the Galaxy Watch's keys touch your other hand on the watch.
      • Keep touching keys until the measurement is completed.

      See the SDK guide for more information.
      BIA_ON_DEMAND
      An enum value for tracking body composition (BIA) data.
      ECG
      Deprecated. 
      This type is deprecated. Use ECG_ON_DEMAND instead.

      An enum value for tracking Electrocardiogram (ECG) data.
      ECG data is retrieved with an on-demand event every 10 milliseconds or 20 milliseconds.

      The on-demand tracking type is not intended for continuous measurement. Please track on-demand type sensors for no longer than 30 seconds.

      ECG_ON_DEMAND
      An enum value for tracking Electrocardiogram (ECG) data.
      HEART_RATE
      Deprecated. 
      This type is deprecated. Use HEART_RATE_CONTINUOUS instead.

      An enum value for tracking the heart rate data. Heart rate data includes Inter-beat Interval (IBI).
      It is retrieved with a batching event every 10 minutes. If a Galaxy Watch's display is on, the data is retrieved every 1 second.

      HEART_RATE_CONTINUOUS
      An enum value for tracking the heart rate data.
      PPG_CONTINUOUS
      An enum value for tracking Photoplethysmogram (PPG) data continuously.
      PPG_GREEN
      Deprecated. 
      This type is deprecated. Use PPG_CONTINUOUS instead.

      An enum value for tracking Photoplethysmogram (PPG) Green data continuously.
      PPG Green data is retrieved with a batching event every 12 seconds.

      PPG_IR
      Deprecated. 
      This type is deprecated. Use PPG_ON_DEMAND instead.

      An enum value for tracking Photoplethysmogram (PPG) Infrared (IR) data.
      PPG IR data is retrieved with an on-demand event every 10 milliseconds.

      On-demand tracking type is not for continuous measurement. Please track on-demand type sensors for no longer than 30 seconds.

      PPG_ON_DEMAND
      An enum value for tracking Photoplethysmogram (PPG) data on-demand.
      PPG_RED
      Deprecated. 
      This type is deprecated. Use PPG_ON_DEMAND instead.

      An enum value for tracking Photoplethysmogram (PPG) Red data.
      PPG Red data is retrieved with an on-demand event every 10 milliseconds.

      On-demand tracking type is not for continuous measurement. Please track on-demand type sensors for no longer than 30 seconds.

      SKIN_TEMPERATURE
      Deprecated. 
      This type is deprecated. Use SKIN_TEMPERATURE_ON_DEMAND instead.

      An enum value for tracking the skin temperature data.
      It is retrieved with an on-demand event every 5 seconds.

      On-demand tracking type is not for continuous measurement. Please track on-demand type sensors for no longer than 30 seconds.

      SKIN_TEMPERATURE_CONTINUOUS
      An enum value for tracking the skin temperature continuously.
      SKIN_TEMPERATURE_ON_DEMAND
      An enum value for tracking the skin temperature data.
      SPO2
      Deprecated. 
      This type is deprecated. Use SPO2_ON_DEMAND instead.

      An enum value for tracking oxygen saturation (SpO2) data.
      It provides 1 data point for each measurement.

      SPO2_ON_DEMAND
      An enum value for tracking oxygen saturation (SpO2) data.
      SWEAT_LOSS
      An enum value for tracking sweat loss data.

      • PPG_ON_DEMAND

        public static final HealthTrackerType PPG_ON_DEMAND
        An enum value for tracking Photoplethysmogram (PPG) data on-demand.
        PPG data is retrieved with an on-demand event with 100 Hz frequency.

        On-demand tracking type is not for continuous measurement. Please track on-demand type sensors for no longer than 30 seconds.

        Permission:
        BODY_SENSORS is required.
        Since:
        1.3.0
        See Also:
        HealthTrackingService.getHealthTracker(HealthTrackerHealthTrackerType, ppgTypeSet)
        ValueKey.PpgSet
        Remark:
        See Using On-demand Tracker Type.

      • SPO2_ON_DEMAND

        public static final HealthTrackerType SPO2_ON_DEMAND
        An enum value for tracking oxygen saturation (SpO2) data.
        It provides 1 data point for each measurement.

        SpO2 Measurement Guide

        • Make sure your Galaxy Watch is on tightly.
        • Move your Galaxy Watch higher on your wrist.
        • Place your elbow on a table.
        • Hold your wrist near your heart.
        • Be careful not to move during the measurement.

        See the SDK guide for more information.
        Permission:
        BODY_SENSORS is required.
        Since:
        1.3.0
        See Also:
        HealthTrackingService.getHealthTracker(HealthTrackerHealthTrackerType)
        ValueKey.SpO2Set
        Remark:
        See Using On-demand Tracker Type.

        public static HealthTrackerType[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (HealthTrackerType c : HealthTrackerType.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        Returns:
        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared
